replies.body: working on my star guardian urgot cosplay rn
Can I hold you to that? >:D

1. Does the Star Guardian re-imagining have to be an actual Guardian, or can it be a Villain for the Star Guardians to face?

2. How "dark" can it get (ie. teen depression and suicide)?

3. I'm going to do Star Guardian Evelynn... may I submit a blank sheet?

4. Can it literally be *any* medium?

1. The focus here should be on the Guardian...but if you've got some cool villain concepts I'd love to see them!

2. As long as it's within that M-rating (per the ruleset) you should be all set. Not all magical girls are sweetness and light and actually having a secret identity and battling the forces of darkness doesn't sound like it's always fun...

3. But how will we know it's Evelynn??? What if we think it's Star Guardian Twitch?

4. What...what are you thinking? O_O
Macaroni Art?
I want it.

> What...what are you thinking? O_O

Here's a preview:
http://imgur.com/a/t6juG

ie. a Physics Thesis on how the stars affect a teenage Evelynn

Consider me intrigued.

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Futurama-Fry.jpg

I hope I have been entered. The browser has been stuck on this loading page for a while https://i.imgur.com/SfvQ1DC.png
-Give the Lantern

My entry anyway https://feardakez.com/nami/

{{champion:267}}

this looks amazing! You put so much detail into it. I especially love the different designs for her staff. If you don't mind me asking, what program did you use to make the videos? I love seeing process videos like that.
Oh thank you! <3 Recorded using OBS Studio and edited with Adobe After Effects. Photoshop for the assets.
Thanks! :)
Your entry went through fine, don't worry! :D
Awesome! Thank you so much

If I were to make, say, an animation featuring star guardians, would I be able to use official voice sounds/quotes from the existing in game guardians skins? Or would I have to source my own voice actors for the characters?

Hey, you're fine to use the official material as long as you don't charge people to view your animation - and you don't use the logos. All the info you could need about how to safely use the League of Legends IP is tucked away [on our Legal page.](https://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber)

Hope this helps, I'd love to see your animation!

I forgot to mention, aside from uploading my entry into a google drive and submitting the associated link, I also published the promo video onto my Facebook page on the day I submitted it; https://www.facebook.com/dappercranium/videos/1775571062741417/ 

Just bringing this up as i think it was mentioned that some works need to be published in a public space to be eligible :D

Looks like I'll need to read up on the Star Guardian lore.

Not how I wanted to spend my week, honestly.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

EDIT: Can I just suggest posting links to the relevant lore for the whole Star Guardian concept? As someone who's never really payed any mind to it, I'm finding it a bit difficult (and, quite frankly, annoying) to be haphazardly scouring the internet for the relevant information in order to get a feel for what it's all about.
I think this is the main info around star guardians so far - http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/star-guardian-2016

I found that (though, on the OCE website) but it seems like there's not a whole lot to go off from there. I was hoping that maybe there was a bit more info. I've been looking at the stats via the profiles of the Guardians, and actually had a few questions (feel free to pass this onto someone else who might know more). The stat "wheels" I've managed to figure out for the most part, with it indicating (starting at the top, going clockwise) Strength, Intelligence, Agility and Speed, but I'm unsure of the other two (assuming Order and Chaos at this point). I'm also curious what the "grades" refer to, is it referring to "common" schooling or is it something specific to the Star Guardians?

Hey Heartvine! 

So if you've ever watched Sailor Moon, or Card Captor Sakura, or any other magical girl anime - that's the sort of media that's similar in tone and setting to Star Guardian. Think regular schoolgirls by day, epic heroes of love and justice by night!

You're right that there's not a lot of set lore out there currently - hopefully that leaves you with room to improvise a bit! Creativity is very very welcome. >:D
What information are you looking for specifically?

Really just looking for anything that provides more context on the Star Guardian lore. As well as clarification on the stats I mentioned before (Show up as ORD and CHA on the "stat wheel" in the profile view) and what the "Grade" part actually refers to (which just seems to be "common" schooling, based on Achenar's response).

I'm not totally sure, but CHA is probably Charisma (think traditional D&D stats). I hadn't actually noticed ORD til you called it out, though - I will try and find out more, but since Jinx is 0 ORD and Poppy is 5 ORD, I think you're probably right and it's a representation of their place on the Order/Chaos spectrum!

One thing I noticed is that ORD and CHA essentially mirror each other (For example, [using a scale of 0-5] Jinx has 0.5 Ord but 4.5 CHA, while Poppy has 5 ORD but 0 CHA) which is what made me think the CHA stands for Chaos.
You make an excellent point and I'm going to find out more. >:D
Can someone send me the link to the winners I cant find it.

Hi! I think i submitted, I just wanna make sure :3c Thanks! (Just submitted a new version, just has my signature and IGN) 

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I've got an entry from you with both of those things on it, so you're all set. :)
Thank you!
Dear Riot OCE, I think I might have entered the wrong version on the night of 17/9/17 for the Star Guardian fanart. Any chance I can send an amended copy?

I have a question in regards to submission of work, do you accept PDF files? I ask because I would also like to know if you're interested in seeing the concept stages of the work, and process images for submissions?
When the comp is over can there be a folder or whatever on this site that contains everyone's submissions? Would really love to see everyone's creative ideas pls Riot

I have created a short story. How do I go about uploading or submitting it?
Thanks in advance for any help{{champion:16}} {{champion:89}}

Hey! So the easiest way would be to post your story on the [Fanfiction board,](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction) and then submit your entry through the submission form with the URL to your post! :D

Hope this helps and can't wait to read your work!

This sounds so cool! But i have a question: Since you say that the entry has to be for this contest. Can we post this in other places (like art accounts) after the contest? I know this may sound stupid but I've been in contests before where they were very stingy about this kind of things!  ^^;

By entering the contest we do reserve the right to share your awesomeness ourselves, but there are NO restrictions on you being able to add it to your portfolios elsewhere! Feel free to share your work anywhere after the contest!
What time are winners being announced?
I'm guessing we cant do the current star guardians can we?

Hey Satansanta, thanks for asking!

So the emphasis here is on designing a new Star Guardian - not one of the existing. That said I think Thums Up has a great idea - if you've got a cool alternate design/concept for one of the existing Star Guardians, that's fine.

This contest is all about your creativity and originality so the emphasis is definitely on creating something new, though!
Am I missing something? No winners announced? Would be nice to find out what happened with this contest! thank you! {{sticker:garen-swing}}
hoi there again, sorry to be annoying but I just wanted to make sure you got my entry, the file I submitted was the splash art and the link was to the ability sheet mock up. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I've got your full entry :D
Hopefully I did well enough with my Star Guardian Kled. Too many talented people out there to compete with.
Nice!

Hello! I have a question~
I was hoping to get a name change before the contest is over, I was wondering, since i've already submitted a piece for this with my current name, What would happen if I changed my name?
Hey Awe, if you end up changing your name - for safety, resubmit your entry with your new name and I'll make sure that one goes through for judging!
Thankyou so much! I might just wait until the event is over, to save you the trouble~ <3
